TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventWaitHandle extends System.Threading.WaitHandle

summary.span: 表示一个线程同步事件。

span.span: Represents a thread synchronization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许线程能够相互通信通过发送信号。The class allows threads to communicate with each other by signaling. 通常情况下，一个或多个线程阻止直到取消阻止的线程调用方法，以释放一个或多个被阻止的线程。Typically, one or more threads block on an until an unblocked thread calls the method, releasing one or more of the blocked threads. 线程都可以发送，然后阻止它，通过调用`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)方法。A thread can signal an and then block on it, by calling the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. > [!NOTE] > 类提供对访问已命名系统同步事件。The class provides access to named system synchronization events. 行为，已终止取决于其重置模式。The behavior of an that has been signaled depends on its reset mode. 使用创建标志会自动重置时收到信号后释放单个正在等待的线程。An created with the flag resets automatically when signaled, after releasing a single waiting thread. 使用创建标志会保留终止状态，直到其调用方法。An created with the flag remains signaled until its method is called. 自动重置事件提供对资源的独占访问。Automatic reset events provide exclusive access to a resource. 如果向自动重置事件发出信号时没有线程正在等待，此信号会一直发出到有线程尝试在等待句柄上等待。If an automatic reset event is signaled when no threads are waiting, it remains signaled until a thread attempts to wait on it. 此时，事件会释放相应线程并立即重置自身，同时阻止后续线程。The event releases the thread and immediately resets, blocking subsequent threads. 手动重置事件是类似于入口。Manual reset events are like gates. 当事件不处于终止状态时，将阻止在其等待的线程。When the event is not signaled, threads that wait on it will block. 在该事件处于有信号状态时，所有正在等待的线程的发布，并且事件一直保持终止状态 （即，不阻止后续等待） 之前其调用方法。When the event is signaled, all waiting threads are released, and the event remains signaled (that is, subsequent waits do not block) until its method is called. 手动重置事件当一个线程必须完成的活动，然后才能继续其他线程时非常有用。Manual reset events are useful when one thread must complete an activity before other threads can proceed. 对象可以用于`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)和方法。 objects can be used with the `static`(`Shared` in Visual Basic) and methods. 有关线程同步机制的详细信息，请参阅[EventWaitHandle、 AutoResetEvent、 CountdownEvent、 ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md)。For more information about thread synchronization mechanisms, see [EventWaitHandle, AutoResetEvent, CountdownEvent, ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法重载，以允许主线程发出信号被阻塞的线程并然后等待，直到线程完成任务。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 此示例启动五个线程，并允许其上阻止使用创建标志，则一个线程一次时释放用户按下 ENTER 键。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key. 该示例然后另外五个线程并释放所有使用使用创建标志。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: initialState
param.span: 如果为 ，则将初始状态设置为终止；如果为 ，则将初始状态设置为非终止。

span.span: to set the initial state to signaled; to set it to nonsignaled.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一个 值，它确定是自动还是手动重置事件。

span.span: One of the values that determines whether the event resets automatically or manually.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定等待句柄最初是否处于终止状态，以及它是自动重置还是手动重置。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled, and whether it resets automatically or manually.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果非终止事件的初始状态，将阻止等待该事件的线程。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果初始状态终止状态，与标志已指定给`mode`，等待该事件的线程不会阻止。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果初始状态终止状态，和`mode`是，等待该事件的第一个线程将会发布立即，此后将重置的事件，并且后续的线程将发生阻塞。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法重载，以允许主线程发出信号被阻塞的线程并然后等待，直到线程完成任务。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 此示例启动五个线程，并允许其上阻止使用创建标志，则一个线程一次时释放用户按下 ENTER 键。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses ENTER key. 该示例然后另外五个线程并释放所有使用使用创建标志。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool initialState, valuetype System.Threading.EventResetMode mode, string name) cil managed
Public Sub New (initialState As Boolean, mode As EventResetMode, name As String)
public: EventWaitHandle(bool initialState, System::Threading::EventResetMode mode, System::String ^ name);

param.name: initialState
param.span: 如果将命名事件作为此调用的结果创建时将初始状态设置为通过信号通知，则为 ；如果将其设置为不通过信号通知，则为 。

span.span: to set the initial state to signaled if the named event is created as a result of this call; to set it to nonsignaled.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一个 值，它确定是自动还是手动重置事件。

span.span: One of the values that determines whether the event resets automatically or manually.

span.span: The name of a system-wide synchronization event.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定在此调用后创建的等待句柄最初是否处于终止状态，它是自动重置还是手动重置，以及系统同步事件的名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, and the name of a system synchronization event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`name`是`null`或空字符串，本地创建。If `name` is `null` or an empty string, a local is created. 如果具有为指定的名称的系统事件`name`参数已存在，`initialState`参数将被忽略。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用此构造函数的已命名的系统事件，指定`false`为`initialState`。When using this constructor for named system events, specify `false` for `initialState`. 此构造函数提供了无法确定是否已创建的已命名的系统事件，因此不能进行任何假设命名事件的状态。This constructor provides no way to determine whether a named system event was created, so you cannot make any assumptions about the state of the named event. 若要确定是否已创建的命名的事件，请使用构造函数或构造函数。To determine whether a named event was created, use the constructor or the constructor. 如果非终止事件的初始状态，将阻止等待该事件的线程。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果初始状态终止状态，与标志已指定给`mode`，等待该事件的线程不会阻止。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果初始状态终止状态，和`mode`是，等待该事件的第一个线程将会发布立即，此后将重置的事件，并且后续的线程将发生阻塞。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定如果将等待句柄作为此调用的结果而创建，最初是否通过信号通知此句柄；指定是否自动或手动重置系统同步事件的名称，以及一个布尔变量，在调用后其值指示是否创建了命名的系统事件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, the name of a system synchronization event, and a Boolean variable whose value after the call indicates whether the named system event was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有为指定的名称的系统事件`name`参数已存在，`initialState`参数将被忽略。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. 在调用此构造函数之后, 使用中的指定的变量的值`ref`参数 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中的参数)`createdNew`来确定是否已命名的系统事件已存在或已创建。After calling this constructor, use the value in the variable specified for the `ref` parameter (`ByRef` parameter in Visual Basic)`createdNew` to determine whether the named system event already existed or was created. 如果非终止事件的初始状态，将阻止等待该事件的线程。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果初始状态终止状态，与标志已指定给`mode`，等待该事件的线程不会阻止。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果初始状态终止状态，和`mode`是，等待该事件的第一个线程将会发布立即，此后将重置的事件，并且后续的线程将发生阻塞。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定如果等待句柄作为此调用的结果而创建，最初是否通过信号通知此句柄；指定是否自动或手动重置系统同步事件的名称和布尔变量，其值在该调用后将指示是否创建了已命名系统事件，以及是否将访问控制安全性应用到命名事件（如果已创建该事件）。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the wait handle is initially signaled if created as a result of this call, whether it resets automatically or manually, the name of a system synchronization event, a Boolean variable whose value after the call indicates whether the named system event was created, and the access control security to be applied to the named event if it is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数应用到已命名的系统的事件创建时，阻止其他代码的事件的控制的访问控制安全性。Use this constructor to apply access control security to a named system event when it is created, preventing other code from taking control of the event. 此构造函数初始化表示的系统事件的对象。This constructor initializes an object that represents a system event. 你可以创建多个表示相同的系统事件的对象。You can create multiple objects that represent the same system event. 如果不存在的系统事件，它被创建具有指定的访问控制安全性。If the system event does not exist, it is created with the specified access control security. 如果该事件存在，则忽略指定的访问控制安全性。If the event exists, the specified access control security is ignored. > [!NOTE] > 调用方具有对新创建的完全控制对象即使`eventSecurity`拒绝或无法授予当前用户某些访问权限。The caller has full control over the newly created object even if `eventSecurity` denies or fails to grant some access rights to the current user. 但是，如果当前的用户尝试获取另一个对象以表示同一个名为事件，使用构造函数或方法，Windows 应用访问控制安全性。However, if the current user attempts to get another object to represent the same named event, using either a constructor or the method, Windows access control security is applied. 如果具有为指定的名称的系统事件`name`参数已存在，`initialState`参数将被忽略。If a system event with the name specified for the `name` parameter already exists, the `initialState` parameter is ignored. 在调用此构造函数之后, 使用中的指定的变量的值`ref`参数 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中的参数)`createdNew`来确定是否已命名的系统事件已存在或已创建。After calling this constructor, use the value in the variable specified for the `ref` parameter (`ByRef` parameter in Visual Basic) `createdNew` to determine whether the named system event already existed or was created. 如果非终止事件的初始状态，将阻止等待该事件的线程。If the initial state of the event is nonsignaled, threads that wait on the event will block. 如果初始状态终止状态，与标志已指定给`mode`，等待该事件的线程不会阻止。If the initial state is signaled, and the flag is specified for `mode`, threads that wait on the event will not block. 如果初始状态终止状态，和`mode`是，等待该事件的第一个线程将会发布立即，此后将重置的事件，并且后续的线程将发生阻塞。If the initial state is signaled, and `mode` is , the first thread that waits on the event will be released immediately, after which the event will reset, and subsequent threads will block. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示通过访问控制安全性的已命名的系统事件的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在指定的事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，它被创建使用初始所属权和访问控制安全性，将拒绝使用该事件的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取和更改事件的权限。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获了异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来等待事件读取和更改的权限所需的权限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，在其上等待和向它发信号所需的权限被打开事件。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果从第三个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，该示例将运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity GetAccessControl ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity GetAccessControl() cil managed
Public Function GetAccessControl () As EventWaitHandleSecurity
public: System::Security::AccessControl::EventWaitHandleSecurity ^ GetAccessControl();

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象表示由当前 对象表示的已命名系统事件的访问控制安全性。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the access control security for the named system event represented by the current object.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示已命名系统事件的访问控制安全性。

span.span: An object that represents the access control security for the named system event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用以下标志 （使用按位或运算组合） 的组合来搜索权限： ， ，和。The method uses the following combination of flags (combined using the bitwise OR operation) to search for permissions: , , and . 用户必须具有权限才能调用此方法和事件必须使用打开标志。The user must have rights to call this method, and the event must have been opened with the flag. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示通过访问控制安全性的已命名的系统事件的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在指定的事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，它被创建使用初始所属权和访问控制安全性，将拒绝使用该事件的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取和更改事件的权限。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获了异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来等待事件读取和更改的权限所需的权限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 已读取权限，使用后方法，并更改，在其上等待并向它发信号所需的权限打开事件。After the permissions have been read, using the method, and changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果从第三个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，该示例将运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.EventWaitHandle OpenExisting (string name);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.EventWaitHandle OpenExisting(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function OpenExisting (name As String) As EventWaitHandle
public: static System::Threading::EventWaitHandle ^ OpenExisting(System::String ^ name);

param.name: name
param.span: 要打开的系统同步事件的名称。

span.span: The name of the system synchronization event to open.

summary.span: 打开指定名称为同步事件（如果已经存在）。

span.span: Opens the specified named synchronization event, if it already exists.

returns.span: 一个对象，表示已命名的系统事件。

span.span: An object that represents the named system event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法尝试打开指定的命名的系统事件。The method tries to open the specified named system event. 如果不存在的系统事件，此方法将引发异常而不是创建的系统事件。If the system event does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system event. 若要创建的系统事件时不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 多次调用此方法使用相同的值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回这些对象表示相同的已命名的系统事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event. 此方法重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定和权限，使用按位或运算组合在一起。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定标志将允许线程等待已命名的系统事件，并指定标志将允许线程调用和方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to wait on the named system event, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示通过访问控制安全性的已命名的系统事件的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在指定的事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，它被创建使用初始所属权和访问控制安全性，将拒绝使用该事件的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取和更改事件的权限。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获了异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来等待事件读取和更改的权限所需的权限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，在其上等待和向它发信号所需的权限被打开事件。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果从第三个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，该示例将运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.EventWaitHandle.ctor named 5/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `rights`参数必须包含标志以允许线程等待事件，和标志以允许线程调用和方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to wait on the event, and the flag to allow threads to call the and methods. 方法尝试打开现有的已命名的系统事件。The method tries to open an existing named system event. 如果不存在的系统事件，此方法将引发异常而不是创建的系统事件。If the system event does not exist, this method throws an exception instead of creating the system event. 若要创建的系统事件时不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 多次调用此方法使用相同的值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回这些对象表示相同的已命名的系统事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示通过访问控制安全性的已命名的系统事件的跨进程行为。The following code example demonstrates the cross-process behavior of a named system event with access control security. 该示例使用方法重载来测试是否存在指定的事件。The example uses the method overload to test for the existence of a named event. 如果事件不存在，它被创建使用初始所属权和访问控制安全性，将拒绝使用该事件的权限的当前用户，但授予的权限读取和更改事件的权限。If the event does not exist, it is created with initial ownership and access control security that denies the current user the right to use the event, but grants the right to read and change permissions on the event. 如果从两个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，第二个副本将在调用引发访问冲突异常。If you run the compiled example from two command windows, the second copy will throw an access violation exception on the call to . 捕获了异常，并且该示例使用方法重载来等待事件读取和更改的权限所需的权限。The exception is caught, and the example uses the method overload to wait on the event with the rights needed to read and change the permissions. 更改权限后，在其上等待和向它发信号所需的权限被打开事件。After the permissions are changed, the event is opened with the rights required to wait on it and signal it. 如果从第三个命令窗口中运行已编译的示例，该示例将运行使用新的权限。If you run the compiled example from a third command window, the example runs using the new permissions. summary.span: 将事件状态设置为有信号，从而允许一个或多个等待线程继续执行。

span.span: Sets the state of the event to signaled, allowing one or more waiting threads to proceed.

returns.span: 如果该操作成功，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the operation succeeds; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关与(包括)，则方法释放一个线程。For an with (including ), the method releases a single thread. 如果不有任何正在等待的线程，一直保持此等待句柄，终止状态之前线程尝试等待它，或者直到其调用方法。If there are no waiting threads, the wait handle remains signaled until a thread attempts to wait on it, or until its method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不能保证，对每个调用方法将释放线程从重置模式。There is no guarantee that every call to the method will release a thread from an whose reset mode is . 如果两个调用太靠近在一起，以便第二次调用前释放线程发生，则释放只有一个线程。If two calls are too close together, so that the second call occurs before a thread has been released, only one thread is released. 它是就像第二个调用未发生。It is as if the second call did not happen. 此外，如果时没有任何等待的线程调用与已终止，则调用不起作用。Also, if is called when there are no threads waiting and the is already signaled, the call has no effect. 有关与(包括)，则调用方法使此等待句柄处于终止状态，直到其调用方法。For an with (including ), calling the method leaves the wait handle in a signaled state until its method is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法重载，以允许主线程发出信号被阻塞的线程并然后等待，直到线程完成任务。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 此示例启动五个线程，并允许其上阻止使用创建标志，则一个线程一次时释放用户按下 ENTER 键。The example starts five threads and allows them to block on an created with the flag, then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key. 该示例然后另外五个线程并释放所有使用使用创建标志。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.SignalAndWait/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已命名的同步事件不存在，则此方法不创建它。If the named synchronization event does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要创建的系统事件时不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果你不确定是否存在一个命名的同步事件，请使用而不是此方法重载方法重载，同步事件不存在时引发异常。If you are uncertain whether a named synchronization event exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the synchronization event does not exist. 此方法重载是等效于调用方法重载并指定和权限，使用按位或运算组合在一起。This method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying and rights, combined by using the bitwise OR operation. 指定标志将允许线程等待已命名的系统事件，并指定标志将允许线程调用和方法。Specifying the flag allows a thread to wait on the named system event, and specifying the flag allows a thread to call the and methods. 多次调用此方法使用相同的值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回这些对象表示相同的已命名的系统事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已命名的同步事件不存在，则此方法不创建它。If the named synchronization event does not exist, this method does not create it. 若要创建的系统事件时不存在，请使用之一构造函数具有`name`参数。To create the system event when it does not already exist, use one of the constructors that has a `name` parameter. 如果你不确定是否存在一个命名的同步事件，请使用而不是此方法重载方法重载，同步事件不存在时引发异常。If you are uncertain whether a named synchronization event exists, use this method overload instead of the method overload, which throws an exception if the synchronization event does not exist. `rights`参数必须包含标志以允许线程等待事件，和标志以允许线程调用和方法。The `rights` parameter must include the flag to allow threads to wait on the event, and the flag to allow threads to call the and methods. 多次调用此方法使用相同的值的`name`不一定返回相同对象，即使返回这些对象表示相同的已命名的系统事件。Multiple calls to this method that use the same value for `name` do not necessarily return the same object, even though the objects that are returned represent the same named system event.

span.span: is an empty string.
-or-
is longer than 260 characters.
is .
A Win32 error occurred.

exception.span: 命名事件存在，但用户不具有所需的安全访问权限。

span.span: The named event exists, but the user does not have the desired security access.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
